Provides common data access functionality for DAO classes.

Provides business logic operations related to bills.

Provides data access functionality for bills.

Represents a client in the system.

Provides business logic operations related to clients.

Provides data access functionality for clients.

Provides methods for establishing and managing database connections.

The Controller class acts as an intermediary between the View and the Business Logic Layer.
